definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: According to this verse, that opens us up to deception.
sentences.chinese: 根据这段经文，那会让我们自我欺骗。

sentences.english: The Patriots totally misconstrued this passage and ignored its context.
sentences.chinese: 完全曲解这段经文并忽略其上下文。

sentences.english: Any kind of interpretation of a text is exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 任何方式的解读经文都是解经。

sentences.english: Can you try to draw a picture of the cherubim according to this section of scripture?
sentences.chinese: 根据此段经文你是否可以尝试画出基路伯的图画？

sentences.english: The Bible is its own expositor. Scripture is to be compared with scripture.
sentences.chinese: 圣经是它自己的解释者，圣经中的经文要互相做比较。

sentences.english: Only two verses in our reading today but what wonderful verses they are.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天所读的经文只有两节，但它们的含意却极深。

sentences.english: Some Scriptures said to focus my ministry and my life on God and God alone.
sentences.chinese: 一些经文教导我要把我的神职和生命致力于上帝一个。

sentences.english: We must engrave the texts on our hearts and souls.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须将经文铭刻我们的心里和灵魂里。

sentences.english: Greeks could read texts like this also.
sentences.chinese: 希腊人也可以这么解读经文。

sentences.english: God is the author of the text, the centrality of Christ as key for scriptural interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是经文的作者，以基督为中心是解读经文的关键。

sentences.english: God is the author of the text, the centrality of Christ as key for scriptural interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是经文的作者，以基督为中心是解读经文的关键。

sentences.english: Such all or nothing reasoning is imposed upon Scripture, not drawn from it.
sentences.chinese: 这种全有或全无的推理是强加的经文，并非取自它。

sentences.english: And thou shalt bind them for a sign upon thine hand， and they shall be as frontlets between thine eyes.
sentences.chinese: 也要系在手上为记号，戴在额上为经文。

sentences.english: Even as a young boy, Jesus was already well acquainted with the Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣在年少的时候，早就熟读经文。

sentences.english: This scripture has always been held in the greatest veneration in Mahayana countries.
sentences.chinese: 这经文一直关押在大乘佛教国家的最大的尊敬。

sentences.english: Saeed read verses from the Qur'an to her.
sentences.chinese: 赛义德为她读古兰经的经文。

definition: silent contemplation/to meditate/to think in silence
the Pentateuch/the five books of Moses in the Old Testament
Book of Job (in the Old Testament)
